description:
[h1]Current version: 1.6[/h1]
[h1]Compatible game versions: 0.5.1[/h1]
This mod includes the following from the FPS game called DOOM Eternal:
-[b]Boost Pads[/b] which throw the player into the air
-[b]Monkey Bars[/b] which the player can boost themselves off of to gain height
-[b]Climbable Walls[/b] which the player can also boost themselves off of
-[b]Projectile/Melee Buttons[/b] that activate after being shot/melee'd, and deactivate after a short while
-[b]Player Teleporters[/b] that teleport the player to a given spot once they have entered an area around the part

All of them should work fine no matter how theyre rotated, although the areaTriggers for them might get in a weird place sometimes. Sorry about that.

[h1]Special thanks to:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Sheggy, for helping me with networking stuff
[*]Holesmak, for making epic screenshots and the thumbnail, among better models
[/list]

Please report any issues in the comments.
Have fun!
(also have a funny bug)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/kE4R9tg.gif[/img]
name: DOOM Eternal Parkour Parts
